select.info: Define a variable that stores the selection of this list.

selectIncludeClass.info: Whether to include the entity class of selection.

multiSelect.info: Whether to allow multiple entities to be selected.

viewBoxSelect.info: Define a variable that stores the navigation of this list.

location.info: Define which property should be used for location.

markUserLocation.info: Whether to show the users location.

maxAllowedViewSize.info: Limit the map view to a maximal size.

showSearchBar.info: Whether to show the search bar.

showFitToDataButton.info: Whether to show the fit to data button.

searchPlaceholder.info: Text to display in search bar.

waitingForInputMessage.info: Text to display while waiting for input.

waitingForDataMessage.info: Text to display while waiting for data.
